bgd_auth_canceled.message: Request was canceled by the user.

bgd_auth_locked_desc.message: The current website is trying to send a request to the Hive Keychain browser extension. Please enter your password below to unlock the wallet and continue.

bgd_auth_no_account.message: The current website is trying to send a request to the Hive Keychain browser extension for account @$1 which has not been added to the wallet.

bgd_auth_no_key.message: The current website is trying to send a request to the Hive Keychain browser extension for account @$1 using the $2 key, which has not been added to the wallet.

bgd_auth_transfer_no_active.message: The current website is trying to send a transfer request to the Hive Keychain browser extension for account @$1 using the active key, which has not been added to the wallet.

bgd_auth_transfer_no_memo.message: The current website is trying to send a request to the Hive Keychain browser extension for account @$1 using the memo key, which has not been added to the wallet.

bgd_init_no_wallet.description: when user didnt create a wallet yet

bgd_init_no_wallet_explained.message: To be able to use Hive Keychain, please set up your wallet. Click on the Hive Keychain logo on the top right corner of your browser (it might be hidden in the extension menu), then setup your password and import your accounts.

bgd_lifecycle_request_canceled.description: Generic answer to websites when user cancel transaction (in the background so it wont show on screen)
bgd_lifecycle_request_canceled.message: Request was canceled by the user.

bgd_ops_add_account_error.message: There was an error adding this account. Please verify its keys.

bgd_ops_add_account_error_invalid.message: This account username does not exist.

bgd_ops_add_auth.message: Succesfully gave $1 authority to @$2 on account @$3.

bgd_ops_add_key_auth.message: $1 has been added as a $2 key for account @$3 with a weight of $4.

bgd_ops_broadcast.message: The transaction has been broadcasted successfully.

bgd_ops_convert.message: Successfully started converting $1 HBD to HIVE on account @$2.

bgd_ops_convert_collaterized.message: Successfully started converting $1 HIVE to HBD on account @$2.

bgd_ops_error.message: There was an error broadcasting this transaction:

bgd_ops_error_broadcasting.message: There was an error broadcasting this transaction, please try again.

bgd_ops_pd.message: Started a $1 HP power down on @$2.

bgd_ops_remove_auth.message: Succesfully removed $1 authority from @$2 on account @$3.

bgd_ops_remove_key_auth.message: $1 has been removed as a $2 key for account @$3.

bgd_ops_sign_tx.message: The transaction has been signed successfully.

bgd_ops_tokens.message: The transaction has been broadcasted successfully. Please check your balance to confirm that it was processed succesfully.

bgd_ops_undelegate.message: Succesfully stopped the delegation to @$1 from account @$2.

import_html_text.message:
Import your keys from another Keychain instance using a .kc file.

popup_html_about_text.message: The overall idea and concept for the Hive Keychain browser extension was created by @yabapmatt who is a developer and witness on the Hive blockchain. It was primarily developed by @stoodkev who is also a Hive developer and witness. The design and development were funded by @aggroed and @yabapmatt through their joint business Splinterlands, which is a blockchain-based collectible trading card game built on top of the Hive blockchain. Be sure to check it out at https://splinterlands.io!

popup_html_convert_hive_intro.description: When clicking on the HIVE arrow menu
popup_html_convert_hive_intro.message: You deposit collateral (HIVE), then you are given HBD up front worth half of the collateral amount (minus a 5% fee). Your official final payment is in 3.5 days. At that point remaining collateral (HIVE) is returned.

popup_html_estimation_info_text.description: on popup main page, click info near estimated value
popup_html_estimation_info_text.message:
The estimated account value is a ballpark idea of what your funds are worth in USD.

Please note that the value does not take into account pending market trades, transfers, or transactions.

popup_html_import_export_text.message:
You can export all your keys encrypted in a file. This will allow you to import them to Keychain on another device or simply safeguard them.

When importing, only accounts that are not already present on the instance will be added.

popup_html_import_success.description: When adding an account via master key
popup_html_import_success.message:
Import successful!

Please select the Keys you wish to store with Hive Keychain:

popup_html_incoming.description: Main page > Delegate. Incoming delegations ($1 is a variable, should be HP)

popup_html_keychainify_text.message: This feature allows you to trigger a Hive Keychain operation when clicking on a supported link on a web page or accessing the URL directly in a browser tab. Currently supports the following Hivesigner links: transfers, delegation, custom JSON, witness proxy and votes.

popup_html_setup_text.message:
Enter your Hive account name and either the master password or the private posting or active key for that account below. Your master password will NOT be saved and will only be used to generate your private keys.

You may add / remove Hive accounts or keys at any time. If you need to create a new Hive account, you can do so at signup.hive.io/.

popup_html_support.description: Support text on the bottom of popup. If you already voted yabapmatt aggroed and stoodkev for witnesses it wont show.
popup_html_support.message: Click here to support Hive Keychain development by casting your witness votes for the creators!
